Comments.Message:
Hi oeN,

     Thanks for logging the the issue, it got me reading up on WCF. :) 

       I've found the cause of the error, its got something to do with the way the wsdl document is generated for WCF.  For example, previously, the schema types are automatically declared within the main wsdl doc when we do something like "http://test/testws.asmx?wsdl."  Now, I found out that with WCF the types are no longer declared directly within the main wsdl doc.  With WCF,  the "schemaLocation" now points to the types, and we have something like schemaLocation="http/blahbalah.xsd=xsd0".

       I've tried out the fix on the HelloWorld service  (generated by Visual Studio) with basicHttpBinding and it worked.   Please expect the fix on the next release.

~Erik
